actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs, H. Rept. 93-1027.
Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1095.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Claims Settlement Act of 1949, as amended, to provide for the timely determination of certain claims of American nationals settled by the United States-Hungarian Claims Agreement of March 6, 1973, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to cover into the Hungarian Claims Fund such sums as may be paid to the United States by the Government of Hungary pursuant to the terms of the United States-Hungarian Claims Agreement of March 6, 1973. Sets forth procedures for the timely determination and payment of claims of American nationals against Hungary for war damage, nationalization, and expropriation of property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Claims Settlement Act of 1949, as amended, to provide for the timely determination of certain claims of American nationals settled by the United States-Hungarian Claims Agreement of March 6, 1973, and for other purposes.
